nodes.text: Save the Mantaris! is a Wizards of the Coast web supplement written by Steve Miller. It is a side adventure based on the sourcebook Secrets of Naboo, where the players investigate sabotage on the Mantaris voyage.

Following the invasion of Naboo, there is a new era of cooperation between the Naboo and the Gungans. They are launching the Mantaris transport to colonize the moons, but there are factions that want to prevent that. A group of spacers are deployed to investigate and remove sabotage after rescuing a captured engineer.
